author: Ars Staff
title: Apple’s AirPods and wireless charging case are down to a new low on Amazon
description: Dealmaster also has deals on Marvel's Spider-Man, Sonos speakers, and more.
content:
1 with 1 posters participating
Today's Dealmaster is headed up by a nice drop on the latest Apple AirPods, as a pair that comes with Apple's Qi wireless charging case is currently down to $150 at Amazon. That's about $50 off Apple's standard going rate, $20 … [+8759 chars]
